20101203011022.000|20101203011025.333|CCO|>> A HUGE FIRE IS RAGING IN IT
20101203011025.333|20101203011028.667|CCO|NOW CARMEL.
20101203011028.667|20101203011032.000|CCO|-- MOUNT CARMEL.
